subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Bomb Defused In London Could Have Caused "Significant Damage"
body:
A British security official says the vehicle found in central London this 
morning was packed with explosives, gas canisters and nuts and bolts. The 
official says it would have caused significant damage. Authorities said 
earlier that they had defused an explosive device found in a car parked in 
the central theater district.
